mapper.select: SELECT feed_back.id, feed_back.role_id roleId, feed_back.title, feed_back.content, feed_back.type, feed_back.platform_id platformId, feed_back.server_id serverId, feed_back.role_name roleName, feed_back.feedback_time feedbackTime, feed_back.contact_info contactInfo, vip_level vipLevel, total_recharge totalRecharge FROM `feed_back` WHERE 1 = 1 and role_id = #{roleId} and type = #{feedbackType} and role_name = #{roleName} and content LIKE concat('%',#{keywords},'%') and feedback_time < DATE_ADD(#{feedbackTimeEnd},INTERVAL 1 day) and feedback_time >= #{feedbackTimeStart} order by feedback_time desc
mapper.update: UPDATE feed_back SET is_replied = #{isReplied},feedback_content=#{feedbackContent} where id = #{id}
